aboutMe.description: I am passionate about web development and video games, with a strong curiosity to learn new technologies. My focus is on creating engaging and functional digital experiences, combining my technical skills with creativity. I strive to continuously improve and add value to every project I work on.

education.description: I have pursued a variety of courses ranging from web development and frontend technologies, learned through institutions and online platforms like Coderhouse, Udemy, and YouTube. Additionally, I studied game programming at Da Vinci, where I acquired skills in game design, virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and more.
education.title: My education

experience.description: I am a frontend developer at Interbanking, where I create effective and appealing web solutions. Previously, I worked in customer service, which allowed me to develop communication skills and a user-centered approach. My background includes numerous courses on technologies such as JavaScript, CSS3, React, and more.
experience.title: My experience

home.description: I'm a developer specialized in building attractive and functional user experiences for modern web applications. I'm passionate about creating intuitive interfaces using technologies like React and Chakra UI. One of my projects is this very portfolio.

resume.description: I stand out for my ability to learn quickly, my passion for web development, and my commitment to delivering quality results. Additionally, my customer service skills allow me to communicate effectively and understand the needs of the end user.
resume.title: Why hire me?

skills.description: I am proficient in HTML, CSS3, JavaScript, and React, and I also have experience with Chakra UI, TypeScript, and the development of modern web applications. I have intermediate skills in graphic design with Photoshop and Illustrator.

aboutMe.description: Soy un apasionado del desarrollo web y de los videojuegos, con una gran curiosidad por aprender nuevas tecnologías. Mi enfoque es crear experiencias digitales atractivas y funcionales, combinando mis habilidades técnicas con mi creatividad. Me esfuerzo constantemente por mejorar y aportar valor a cada proyecto en el que trabajo.
